TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi serializable beforefieldinit PaperSource extends System.Object

Docs.summary: 指定给打印机送纸的纸盒。

remarks.format:
## Remarks 此类由<xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.PaperSources%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>和<xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PageSettings.PaperSource%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>属性用于获取打印机上可用的纸张来源纸盒, 并分别为页面设置纸张来源。
有关打印的详细信息, 请参阅<xref:System.Drawing.Printing>命名空间概述。
## Examples 下面的代码示例用打印机`comboPaperSource`支持的纸张来源填充组合框。 标识为属性, 该属性为通过组合框的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListControl.DisplayMember%2A>属性添加的项提供显示字符串。 <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PaperSource.SourceName%2A> 该示例要求名为<xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument> `printDoc`的变量存在并且存在特定的组合框。
[!code-cpp[PaperSource and PaperSize Example with Resolution#2](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/PaperSource and PaperSize Example with Resolution/CPP/source.cpp#2)] [!code-csharp[PaperSource and PaperSize Example with Resolution#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/PaperSource and PaperSize Example with Resolution/CS/source.cs#2)] [!code-vb[PaperSource and PaperSize Example with Resolution#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/PaperSource and PaperSize Example with Resolution/VB/source.vb#2)]

|Property|初始值| |--------------|-------------------| |<xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PaperSource.Kind%2A>|<xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PaperSourceKind.Custom?displayProperty=nameWithType>| |<xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PaperSource.SourceName%2A>|<xref:System.String.Empty?displayProperty=nameWithType>|

Docs.summary: 获取或设置表示 值之一或自定义值的整数。
Docs.value: 表示 值之一或自定义值的整数值。

remarks.format:
## Remarks 下表显示了每个<xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PaperSourceKind>成员的整数值。 大于256的<xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PaperSourceKind>任何内容映射<xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PaperSourceKind.Custom>到枚举中的, 但<xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PaperSource.RawKind%2A>属性返回实际整数值。
|整数值|PaperSourceKind 成员| |-------------------|----------------------------| |1|<xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PaperSourceKind.Upper>| |2|<xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PaperSourceKind.Lower>| |3|<xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PaperSourceKind.Middle>| |4|<xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PaperSourceKind.Manual>| |5|<xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PaperSourceKind.Envelope>| |6|<xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PaperSourceKind.ManualFeed>| |7|<xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PaperSourceKind.AutomaticFeed>| |8|<xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PaperSourceKind.TractorFeed>| |9|<xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PaperSourceKind.SmallFormat>| |10|<xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PaperSourceKind.LargeFormat>| |11|<xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PaperSourceKind.LargeCapacity>| |14|<xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PaperSourceKind.Cassette>| |15|<xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PaperSourceKind.FormSource>| |256或更大|<xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PaperSourceKind.Custom>|

Docs.summary: 获取或设置纸张来源的名称。

remarks.format:
## Remarks 需要显示纸张来源时, 请调用此属性。 根据<xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PaperSource.Kind%2A>属性生成的纸张来源的名称。
## Examples 下面的代码示例用打印机`comboPaperSource`支持的纸张来源填充组合框。 标识为属性, 该属性为通过组合框的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListControl.DisplayMember%2A>属性添加的项提供显示字符串。 <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PaperSource.SourceName%2A> 该示例要求名为<xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument> `printDoc`的变量存在并且存在特定的组合框。
[!code-cpp[PaperSource and PaperSize Example with Resolution#2](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/PaperSource and PaperSize Example with Resolution/CPP/source.cpp#2)] [!code-csharp[PaperSource and PaperSize Example with Resolution#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/PaperSource and PaperSize Example with Resolution/CS/source.cs#2)] [!code-vb[PaperSource and PaperSize Example with Resolution#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/PaperSource and PaperSize Example with Resolution/VB/source.vb#2)]
